title: MQTT_RETAIN_HANDLING (Enum)
text:
TYPE MQTT_RETAIN_HANDLING :
Enum for the Retain Handling option.
This option specifies whether retained messages are sent when the subscription is established
Attributes:
qualified_only

rows.Name: Not_Exists
rows.Comment: Send retained messages at the time of the subscribe

rows.Name: Do_Not_Send
rows.Comment:
Send retained messages at subscribe only if the subscription does not currently exist
Do not send retained messages at the time of the subscribe
